modName: Ashland Amulets - Morrowind Artifacts for Skyrim
summary:
Adds three amulets artifacts from Morrowind to Skyrim:
\"Madstone of the Ahemmusa\", \"Teeth of the Urshilaku\" and \"Thong of Zainab\".
They are scattered throughout Skyrim, but clues are given to find them.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://twitter.com/PrvtIPrivateEye][img]http://i.imgur.com/jn5Gp4X.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EfkYM.jpg[/img]


This small mod adds three artifact amulets that appeared in Morrowind to the land of Skyrim.
The original designs were used to recreate the amulets.
In Morrowind, \"Madstone of the Ahemmusa\", \"Teeth of the Urshilaku\" and \"Thong of Zainab\", are three amulets that are obtained through the course of the main questline.
They are received from three different Ashlander tribes.
Now these amulets can again be found hidden in Skyrim!

But where to find them?
The three amulets are hidden all over Skyrim but there are 2 notes that will help your search.
Start the search at the New Gnisis Corner Club in Windhelm.
There you will find one of the amulets upstairs along with a lengthy letter.
This letter holds the (slighlty vague) clue to find the next!

Every amulet comes with a different bonus
The Madstone of the Ahemmusa gives the player a very powerfull Ward Spell when equipped.
The Teeth of the Urshilaku protect from Paralysis.
And the Thong of Zainab grants a Detect Life spell when equipped.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eAH1wVp.png[/img][/center]


Looking for the mod in a different language?

Go here for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21233]German[/url]
And here for a [url=http://modgames.net/load/304-1-0-12663]Russian[/url] translation.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eAH1wVp.png[/img][/center]


[b]Now the important part![/b]
Modders are [b]free[/b] to use the amulets (the meshes, textures and scripts) for their own modding projects!
[b]All I ask is credit for my hard work.[/b]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eAH1wVp.png[/img][/center]


For the people who really can\'t find the amulets, here are the screenshots with the locations.

[u]Don\'t spoil the fun though![/u]
Only check if you are really, really stuck.

Amulet 2
http://i.imgur.com/aVEckh.jpg?1
Amulet 3
http://i.imgur.com/A2shmh.jpg?1


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eAH1wVp.png[/img][/center]


Please also check out my other Morrowind mods :)

author: PrivateEye
